document.full_text: chipotle mexican grill inc has "lost" about 40 workers in two of its washington, d.c., restaurants after an internal review showed they were not authorized to work in the united states.
document.title: chipotle says "lost" 40 illegal workers in capital
lines_and_colors: chipotle mexican grill inc has "lost" about 40 workers in two of its washington, d.c., restaurants after an internal review showed they were not authorized to work in the united states.
